GameObject
Class BrickWall

java.lang.Object
  GameObject.GameObject
      GameObject.StaticObject
          GameObject.BrickWall

public class BrickWall
extends StaticObject

Used to represent the BrickWall objects placed on the grid at fixed positions during GamePlay. Note that this object falls in the category of static objects, and it provides no other logic than the one needed for collision detection and disappearance once it is hit by a bomb explosion.

Constructor Detail

BrickWall

public BrickWall(int posX,
                 int posY,
                 boolean visible,
                 boolean hasPowerUp)
BrickWall constructor. Contains position attributes of the object, and two booleans used to control the logic behind its disappearance.

Parameters:
posX - x position of the BrickWall on the grid
posY - y position of the BrickWall on the grid
visible - boolean representing whether the wall is visible to the player or not
hasPowerUp - boolean representing whether the wall has a powerup hidden under its image or not
Method Detail

disappear

public void disappear()
Toggle the visibility of the tile to false.
